sentences.en: An air of unstudied spontaneous utterance is apt to be painstakingly achieved.
sentences.cn: 一时冲动就脱口而出的说话风格自然很难让人接受.

sentences.en: Broken bones were painstakingly pieced together and reshaped.
sentences.cn: 断骨被十分小心地接合复位。

sentences.en: Doctors painstakingly pieced together the broken bones.
sentences.cn: 医生们精心地把碎骨拼合起来。

sentences.en: Every aspect of the original has been closely studied and painstakingly reconstructed.
sentences.cn: 原作的每一细节都经过了仔细研究,费尽苦心才得以重现.

sentences.en: He advocates painstakingly that buys down this base.
sentences.cn: 他极力主张买下这块地基.
他曾苦心研究过这题目.

sentences.en: He tries to persuade the commission painstakingly to buy down this base.
sentences.cn: 他极力劝说委员会买下这块地基.

sentences.en: He's always painstakingly at his books.
Success always goes to those who do their job painstakingly.
sentences.cn: 成功永远属于用心做事的人.

sentences.en: The cause they contrived so painstakingly also ended in failure.
sentences.cn: 他们惨淡经营的事业也以失败而告终.

sentences.en: The garment store they built up painstakingly also ended in failure.
sentences.cn: 他们苦心经营的服装店也以失败而告终.

sentences.en: The garment store they so painstakingly built up also ended in failure.
sentences.cn: 他们苦心经营的服装商店也以失败而告终.

sentences.en: The old painting was damaged in the flood and had to be painstakingly restored.
sentences.cn: 那幅古画在洪水中遭到毁坏,必须精心修复.

sentences.en: What be is is mystical force incentive people fought so painstakingly?
sentences.cn: 是什么神奇的力量激励着人们如此苦斗?

trans.tran_cn: 刻苦地，煞费苦心地，精心，勤勤恳恳，刻意
